name: Find the differences: medieval fighting manuals
name_original: Find the differences: medieval fighting manuals
description:
Spot the differences on these pages of medieval fighting manuals. Click on the parts which are not the same in both images. Don't forget to use the hint button if you have too much trouble finding something.

Points are awarded based on the time you need to finish the game. Replay to get another set of differences. Hope you enjoy :)
